name: Heroes Unleashed
description:
Heroes Unleashed] is an FPS + MOBA genre mobile game, developed by Tianyoo and brought to you by Jollity! Players of all ages are taking part as a class-based first-person shooter to do what they could to save the world from extinction!

The game consists of four roles: Offense, Defense, Tank, and Support which are comprised of multiple unique heroes with their own skill set. Parties of five are formed among players to battle out, strategize & most importantly, to win!

Gameplay offers a wide variety of modes ranging from "Escort Mission", "Team Deathmatch", "Capture the Flag" and many more! With that in place, it definitely brings out the best experience in both Mobile FPS & MOBA genre by combining fast-paced immersive multiplayer action & realistic gameplay. Furthermore, this optimized system on the mobile platform will definitely give players a breathtaking sensation towards Mobile FPS+MOBA gaming.
